mapper.insert: INSERT INTO projects (id, ownerId, name, description, cover, price, status, pubTime, duration, applyCount, createdAt, specificRole, bargain, statusText, typeText, visitCount, canRefresh, type, developerType) VALUES (#{id}, #{ownerId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{cover}, #{price}, #{status}, #{pubTime}, #{duration}, #{applyCount}, #{createdAt}, #{specificRole}, #{bargain}, #{statusText}, #{typeText}, #{visitCount}, #{canRefresh}, #{type}, #{developerType})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM projects WHERE ownerId = #{ownerId} AND name = #{name}
